situation: A timber joist 40mmx190mm (dressed dimensions) spaced at 0.3m on centers carries a floor load of 2.4kPa including the floor finish. The joist is supported by the girder at 3m. Two length of joists are used. L=3m and L=3.5m. EI is constant throughout the span.

subquestions.question: Compute the maximum flexural stress when L=3m.
What is the maximum flexural stress when L=3.5m?
What is the maximum shear stress when L=3m?
